document_data.name: Maurran
document_data.mainbody:
{{quote|What do you think you are, heroes? Are you ready to meet a heroic doom?|Kithguard Maurran}}
Kithguard '''Maurran''' was a [[shadar-kai (fey)|shadar-kai]] [[rogue]] of the midâ€“14th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Serving Kithlord [[Thieraven]], he commanded a group of shadar-kai defenders at the [[Lost Refuge]] in the [[Vast Swamp]] in the [[1374|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]]. He was likely slain when adventurers in service to [[Mystra]] assaulted the fort.
document_data.Possessions: Equipped similarly to all his people, Maurran wielded a well-made [[spiked chain]] and [[composite shortbow]] and wore ''+2 [[studded leather]]'' and a ''+2 [[gal-ralan]]''.
